title: Rulebreakers
desc:
- Can be played on any card without an effect, and vice versa.
- <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899> cards may have an effect that breaks a single rule in <#1106234448963452968>/<#1123114614805246024> or allow another card to break a single rule in <#1106234448963452968>/<#1123114614805246024>.
- Only one <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899> card may be played during the course of a game. Any <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899> cards in a playerâ€™s hand when a <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899> card is played will become a basic number <:rgby:1107167371048788028> card.
- These cards are banned in competitive tournaments.
